title: public sharing broken in 4.5.3
body:
sharing a folder in 4.5.3 by url gives me the following link:

https://slmmr.net/oc/public.php?service=files&t=086c16e18d9b7b34fda9f788ab178116

this gives these errors:

warning: cannot modify header information - headers already sent by (output started at /home/slmmr/public_html/oc/apps/files_sharing/public.php:236) in /home/slmmr/public_html/oc/lib/template.php on line 165

**_note that when i click the link on the top left to the shared folder, from the shared folder page while not logged in, i get this link and the page works as expected:_**

https://slmmr.net/oc/public.php?service=files&t=086c16e18d9b7b34fda9f788ab178116&path=%2f
